content.p: This is the place where you’ll be supported, but challenged, so that you can thrive as a teacher. This is the place where you’ll experience a diverse schools partnership supporting your journey to becoming an inclusive practitioner. This is the place where you’ll work with education experts who can guide you to become the teacher you want to be. This is teacher training at the University of Nottingham. For trainee primary teachers qualified to teach Key Stage 1 and 2 (5-11 years) For trainee secondary teachers qualified to teach Key Stages 3-5 (11-18 years) For trainee secondary teachers qualified to teach maths Access to a large, strong, diverse schools partnership Find out more about our schools partnerships Personalised support and enrichment opportunities Find out how we help you develop as a teacher Ranked top 10 in the UK and top 50 worldwide QS World University Rankings by Subject 2024
